document_data.name: Austrus Flambrant
document_data.mainbody: '''Austrus Flambrant''' was a noble in [[Cormyr]] and the lord of [[Flambrant]] House.
document_data.Relationships: Flambrant was close to Lady [[Jalassra Dawningdown]].
document_data.History: Around [[1480 DR]], Lady Dawningdown disappeared from [[Suzail]] and Flambrant believed the culprits to be [[Mirt]] and Lady [[Rensharra Ironstave]]. He managed to find them near Lord [[Lothan Durncaskyn]] of [[Immerford]] and went asking for answers. Mirt confronted him and knocked him down.
